rows.label: qev095103_MSG0001
rows.name: Thank you. I will not forget this debt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0002
rows.name: ...Mmm? You are surprised?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_JNK0010
rows.name: Attack

rows.label: qev095103_SEL0011
rows.name: Go after the Prone out of habit.

rows.label: qev095103_JNK0020
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev095103_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask why the Prone were being held captive.

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0003
rows.name:
Wait! We are Tree Clan.
We are different from evil Cavern Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0004
rows.name: Cavern Clan are our sworn enemy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0005
rows.name: I am Sevvy Belgazus. Chieftain of Tree Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0006
rows.name: I swear by honor of clan, we wish you no harm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0007
rows.name: We are members of Tree Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0008
rows.name: We have fought Cavern Clan Prone for 10,000 suns.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0009
rows.name: I am Sevvy Belgazus. Chieftain of Tree Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0010
rows.name: I swear by honor of clan, we wish you no harm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0011
rows.name: Spirit of Great Tree brought us together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0012
rows.name: It is fate![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_JNK0030
rows.name: Ask about Plans

rows.label: qev095103_SEL0031
rows.name: Question Sevvy as to his immediate plans.

rows.label: qev095103_JNK0040
rows.name: Ask about Captivity

rows.label: qev095103_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Sevvy how the Tree Clan came to be imprisoned.

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0013
rows.name: As you see, we are few in number.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0014
rows.name: Other Tree clansmen are held elsewhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0015
rows.name:
But now, I must hide these clansmen from Cavern Clan.
Can you keep us safe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0016
rows.name: Our clans fought long before we came to this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0017
rows.name: It is feud of millennia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0018
rows.name:
Then Ganglion came to our world.
Allied with Cavern Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0019
rows.name: We lacked technology to resist. They took us prisoner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0020
rows.name: Ever since, our days are full of heavy labor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0021
rows.name: But thanks to you, tomorrow will be day of freedom.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0022
rows.name: Other Tree clansmen are being held elsewhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0023
rows.name:
But now, I must hide these clansmen from Cavern Clan.
Can you keep us safe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_JNK0050
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev095103_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Sevvy to follow you to NLA.

rows.label: qev095103_JNK0060
rows.name: Defer

rows.label: qev095103_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell Sevvy that you will discuss it with the other humans.

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0024
rows.name: Thank you. I am curious about this NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095103_MSG0025
rows.name: Very well. We need temporary asylum only.[ST:wait ]
